fullplot: In this unusually accurate biography, small-time hood Al Capone comes to Chicago at the dawn of Prohibition to be the bodyguard of racketeer Johnny Torrio. Capone's rise in Chicago gangdom is followed through murder, extortion, and political fraud. He becomes head of Chicago's biggest "business," but moves inexorably toward his downfall and ignominious end.
plot: This factual biography of gang lord Al Capone follows his rise and fall in Chicago gangdom during the Prohibition era.
title: Al Capone
